name: Deep Breath
description:
You only have one breath- hold onto it.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move and use R to restart

After the blue bar drains, you will exhale

After the green bar drains, you will drown

Push the carbon dioxide bubbles onto the plants to convert them back into oxygen

Hold onto your oxygen and make it to the exit

Made in 7 hours for DiveJam
